meanings.sent1: The movie is not suitable for underage viewers.
meanings.sent2: She was not allowed to enter the club because she was underage.
meanings.sent3: The underage puppy tried to act tough but ended up tripping over its own paws.
meanings.sent4: The garden gate stood tall, keeping the underage rabbits from entering the vegetable patch.
meanings.sent5: The warning sign clearly stated that the ride was only for those not underage.

meanings.sent1: The store sells clothes for both adults and underage customers.
meanings.sent2: He felt out of place at the party, being the only underage guest.
meanings.sent3: The underage kitten thought it was a fierce lion in the mirror reflection.
meanings.sent4: The treehouse was a forbidden paradise for the underage neighborhood kids.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reminded the students that the quiz was for those not underage.
